products.title: Magnum, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In grey-toned oatmeal, the beige, like the whole magnum range, displays an attractively natural aesthetic, combining its neutral colouring with a textured stitching. The range's translucent, moveable strips allow versatile privacy and light control. For a light, yet protective, window covering in your living room, employ the subtle beige, which will blend perfectly into a chocolate and cream colour scheme.

products.title: Vogue, Beige - Day Night Blind
products.description: In subtle peachy cream, the vogue in beige is a soft and appealing blind, comprising of pliable, tightly stitched fabric and clear, see-through strips. All brackets and controls are concealed neatly in the overhead rail cassette, keeping the look clean and tidy. Pair the beige with pretty corals for a sweet and summery aesthetic in the living room. This 'peaches 'n' cream' look can be easily achieved by sticking to a base of cream and furnishing and accessorising with the coral tones, using them for throws, cushions, and wall hangings.

products.title: Origin, Mushroom - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin mushroom allows you to control the light and shade in your home with minimal effort, whilst at the same time adding a richly authentic aesthetic that gives every modern decorated home the homely touch. Look closer and you'll see the subtle patterning of the voile as it hangs elegantly in front of the fabric. Beiges, sandy browns, and lightly coloured leathers all work beautifully when placed against origin mushroom.

products.title: Bayham, Parchment - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegance and sophistication go hand in hand when you caste your eye over the bayham range. Parchment compliments the free flowing nature of the voile panels with gently placed strips of soft white fabric that is as finely woven as it is calm and refreshing. Parchment allows you to make a feature of your window spaces again as you celebrate the beauty of the simple things in life. Keeping your decor crisp and calm with large white scatter cushions and a light grey rug will give your living room the relaxing look and feel that you have always wanted.
